summary:
An ambitious International Sales and Channel professional with a strategic understanding of enterprise challenges related to digital transformation. As industry 4.0 is shifting the managerial mindset, a critical look at current business model is crucial. How to approach a platform business and how to profit from the network effect are topics that I daily discuss with Executive level. I am a motivated, self starter, high energy, motivated with a proven ability to perfectly function with and within a team. 
Excellent English and Dutch languages skills in addition to French and Arabic. 
Ability to maintain high sales activity levels and capability to manage several opportunities simultaneously. 
The past 20 years I have built a wide and international experience in selling IT software solutions and complex projects.  My strength lies in my listening skills, understand customer needs and transforming these into opportunities. 
This has enabled me to strength my adoption capability and the ease to merge into different teams or company cultures. 
Specialties: Customer On-boarding, FPA, Capture en RPA software.
Also CRM, ERP software, Platform concept, AI-ML & Iot tool and Technology. 
SEPA Payment & transaction software, SCT, SCC Doc. handling e-invoicing. 
B2B Gateway (Secure Transport & Interchange) End points (Activator), MFT: File transfer  (CFT ) Pesit protocol,  Security & Identity: File Tranfer Direct (e-mails) 
B2B, Messaging Portal , Catalgoue Manager , E-Invoicing (Scansys).  
B2B-EDI (Electronic data interchange) en GDS (Global data synchronisation)  PDM
REST. Onboarding, E-Commerce. Data Modling. SalesForce explorer 
Knowledge: 
Partner - Channel Management - Customer success Manager. 
Innovation Management
Link between IT and business. 
Understanding C-level challenges, succes factors and technological adoption for an improved customer experience. 
Specialised in Platform research and platform knowledge. 
Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine learning (ML) (Python)

school.name: University of Amsterdam - Amsterdam Business School

profile_positions.description: Engaging with C-level business owners to accelerate innovation through systems integration:Deal with technological shift; such as eCommerce and multichannel strategy. Quickly response to increasing and diverse customers demand, such data access and customer experience. Launch innovative products and services using an agile and no code- based integration methodology supported by MuleSoft API-Led approach.  Cognizant has a dedicated MuleSoft practice with more than 1800+ MuleSoft trained and 700+ MuleSoft certified specialists Globally, executing 50+ successful cross service line implementations of MuleSoft’s platform. Cognizant is leading MuleSoft implementations for large and reputed European Banking, Insurance, Energy & Utilities, Consumer Goods and Life sciences customers.
profile_positions.title: Director Integration business BeNeLux

profile_positions.description:
Vanenburg Software is an independent software and services organisation and delivers Smart Process Apps and Rootstock Cloud ERP based on the latest technological developments. 
Supported by multiple platforms like Force.com, the Google Cloud Platform and Amazon, Vanenburg Software the Tech Entrepreneur can support your digital transformation journey. 
By using innovative accelerators such as Internet of Things, API’s, Machine Learning and Big Data, Vanenburg Software brings the newest technology at your doorstep with the speed of light. Our solutions are flexible, scalable, and integrated into your new or existing IT infrastructure.
profile_positions.title: Account Executive

profile_positions.description: Descartes is a worldwide SAAS solution supplier that contributes to innovation, productivity and business to business integration. The logistic technology platform combines the world most extensive logistics network and B2B global trade integration network. The platform supports an agile and up to date inventory, assets and people information when and where needed.
profile_positions.title: Key Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Kofax is a leading provider of software to simplify and transform the First Mile of business. We combine market leading capture, content, process management, data integration, mobile, e-signature, customer communications management, search and analytics capabilities from Kofax and ReadSoft into a unified process automation development and deployment platform. This platform enables organizations to increase their responsiveness to customers, provide better service, gain a competitive advantage and better grow their businesses while reducing operating costs.
Headquarters: Irvine, CA
Subsidiaries: 30 countries
Employees: ~2,900
Channel Partners: 1,000+
Products: Available in 70+ countries
Customers: 25,000+
profile_positions.title: Commercial Account Rep (PAM)

profile_positions.description:
Sentenial was founded in 2003 with its first employee joining the company in February 2004. In the early days, Sentenial provided payment management solutions to corporate originators and later to banks themselves. Sentenial has thus always had its product focus on payment services, and especially direct debit origination. The company began to grow rapidly servicing several hundred corporate customers across Ireland and the UK.

With the announcement of SEPA, a key business decision was made to make SEPA payment and transition services for both corporates and banks its single product focus.
As one of the longest-standing providers of SEPA solutions, Sentenial’s Origix platform provides a full suite of payment and direct debit services through either a hosted SaaS (Software as a Service) model which enables rapid on-boarding, or a fully installed end-to-end system at the customer site. Sentenial’s commitment to SEPA as our core business has been unwavering. We pride ourselves as thought leaders in the SEPA arena and have been acknowledged by our peers on a number of occasions, including our successes at the Banking Technology Awards where Origix Corporate has won awards for the past four consecutive years.

Sentenial is the specialist provider of SEPA payment solutions for Pan European banks and corporates. With recognised expertise and the most comprehensive SEPA payment offering available, Sentenial is today the trusted choice of leading European banks and over 500 corporate customers.
profile_positions.title: Acccount Executive

profile_positions.description:
Large accounts. Solution selling
Verticals: Utility, Telco and Services
Geographic responsabilities: The Benelux.
Axway Products: MFT, Integration, B2BI and e-mail & Identity Security

My day to day responsibilities as an Account Manager are the following: 
•	To achieve a yearly target of one million euro licenses only. 
•	Verticals of responsibilities are; Services, Utility and Telecom. 
•	Geographical area; The Benelux.
•	Manage existing account and use own network built in the Benelux through the years to help Axway to achieve its overall sales target. 
•	Come up with new leads and sales strategies to penetrate new markets and or new verticals. 
•	Proactive and very self serving, when needed, all the way through the sales cycle. 
Cold calling, make appointments, introduction meeting, prospect filtration, solution selling presentation, process/services/price negotiation and closing deals. 
Most of my customers/leads are Large Accounts, examples Vattenfall (Nuon), Eneco (Stedin), GasUnie, Sibelga, Telfort, T-mobile, KPN, Logica.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
As a Account manager, my role is to deliver the quarterly and yearly turnover as agreed with SRC and mentioned in the company commercial business plan. 
Independently start up business opportunities from scratch within the chosen target market, like retail industry, pharmaceutical and ‘DIY’. 
Work as entrepreneur and come up with new ideas to build up a commercial and solid relationship with existing customers. 
Have a sharp eye for changes in business processes of the target market and use different methods to adapt to the change and win it. 
Lease with the management team and the marketing people to adopt ideas and set up marketing strategy according to the needs. 
Use all resources available, like inside sales force or presales consultant to heat SRC and own commercial target.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
My daily job consists of the following activities: 
To liaise with different departments, customers and Account Managers Large accounts in order to manage and produce the necessary reports. 
Produce SAP reporting tools for the billing department, sale and management team. 
Working very close to Account Manager corporate accounts. Production of monthly sales reporting, like the outstanding billing large accounts. 
Statistical indicator reporting  and revenue related documents. These reports ensure  sales and management efficiency & effectiveness and ability to take decision based on the numbers. 
In these years I have been able to Introduce the macro reporting method, based on Excel VBS  macros’ to  speed up the reporting production process.
profile_positions.title: SAP reporting (VB-macro expert)
